original_text: They must take the blood of a sin offering into the Tent of Meeting. It is a sacrifice to atone for sin. Nobody should eat any of that offering. The priest must burn it.
korean_text: 그러나 피를 가지고 회막에 들어가 성소에서 속죄하게 한 속죄제 제물의 고기는 먹지 못할지니 불사를지니라

sentences.original_text: They must take the blood of a sin offering
It is a sacrifice to atone for sin
Nobody should eat any of that offering
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 그 제물을 먹어서는 안 됩니다
